body.name: Digital Camera for Photography, 4K 48MP Vlogging Camera for YouTube with WiFi, 3-inch 180-degree Flip Screen, 16X Digital Zoom, 52mm Wide Angle & Macro Lens, 32GB TF Card and 2 Batteries(Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 44 mins
features: 📸【Camera for Photoggraphy and Video】The digital camera featuring 4K video and 48MP photo resolution, the vlogging camera supports 16X Digital Zoom, Video Pause, Recording while Charging, Loop Recording, Continuous Shooting, Silent Recording, Self-Timer. with the latest upgraded chip to ensure the camcorder images more high-definition, more realistic. It’s the best gift for friends and family.

📸【Digital Camera with Wide Angle Lens & Macro Lens】This digital camera equipped the camera with a professional detachable 52mm wide angle lens with macro lens, so the camera is great for capturing wide horizons easily, and macro lenses capture the diversity of the tiny world. Sharp 4K photos can be ruled out with manual focus. With a knob on the top of the camera, you can switch between photos, video, time-lapse photography and other features.

📸【Vlogging Camera with Webcam】The vlogging camera can be connected to the PC via a USB cable. Then you can choose "Mass Storage Mode" to transfer files to your computer or choose "PC Camera" to use it as a PC camera to enjoy video chat or live broadcast. If you want to play the video you shoot, the digital camera supports HDMI function, you can use HDMI cable to directly connect to HDTV (HDMI cable is not included).

📸【Pause Function and Record While Charging】This 4k digital camera has an excellent pause function that allows you to continue recording in the same file without restarting a new file. Just press the power button on the camera to pause or restart recording. This digital video camera is equipped with 2 1500 mAh Li-Ion batteries (30-50 minutes/each), which supports recording while charging, allowing you to plug in AC or power bank to charge for continuous use .

📸【Best Choice for Beginners】This camera is very suitable for entry-level users and is a great gift for beginners. This digital camera has a compact design, measures 4.5*1.7*3inches, weighs 0.57lb (with battery), and also comes with a ¼ standard tripod thread (tripod not included) and a hot shoe (to connect an external microphone). In addition, our products have a three-month warranty, if the quality of the camera, three months to return or exchange.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WiFi Function Used as Bluetooth How to use WiFi? First: Install the app Download the APP named XDV PRO on the Apple App Store,or by scanning the QR code on the camera. Second: Connect to WiFi On your phone or tablet,go to WiFi settings and find "4K WIFI". Enter the displayed password: 12345678 to connect. Third: Start remote shooting or recording After connecting, open the camera app on your device and choose the remote shooting or record option. This will now display the camera's live view on your phone screen, and you also can summon and manipulate the settings. Benefits of WIFI function 1. You can transfer photos and videos in the camera to your mobile phone or tablet (convenient) 2. The camera can be controlled with a mobile phone or tablet (remote control) Tips: If you cannot connect to WiFi or use it after downloading, please turn off the mobile network of your phone.

Seven Shortcut Key Functions W/T: Digital zoom, fast controlSupplemental light: you can take pictures at night or in a dark environmentTimed photo: Quickly enter timed photoContinuous shooting: quickly enter the three continuous shootingDelete: delete unwanted photos or videosDisplay: press once to clear the icon on the screen, press twice to make the screen blackMenu: Quickly enter the menu key

4K Digital Camera 4K Video Resolution and 48 Megapixels Pictures This camera has 2 functions of recording and taking pictures Lightweight and compact This camera measures 5(inch)*2(inch)*2.4(inch) and weighs 8.1 ounces. Easy to carry when traveling. Multifunction camera The vlogging camera supports 16x digital zoom, video pause, recording while charging, loop recording, continuous shooting, silent recording, selfie.Best for YouTube shoot lovers Focus Autofocus and manual focus

Product Details Main Feature： Video Resolution: 4K_3840X2160 (30FPS) Photo Resolution: 48MP, 30MP, 24MP, 12MP, 8MP, 5MP, 3MP Video/Photo Format:MP4/JPG Display: 3.0-inch ultra-high-definition 180-degree screen Storage: 32GB-128GB Micro SD card (class10) Digital zoom: 16X digital zoom Lens: Fixed lens F/2.4MM，f=5.04mm White balance：Auto / sunny / cloudy / incandescent / fluorescent Exposure：–3.0EV～+3.0EV Battery: Each NP-40/1500mAh Li-ion battery can work for 40-50 minutes (2 batteries are included in the package) Warm Tips: 1.Please read the instructions carefully 2.Before using the camera, format the SD card with the video camera(32GB Micro SD card included) 3.The focus function is suitable for photos, and you need to manually control the focus button when recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good starter camera
reviews.reviewText: Fun to play with and learn to use. Lighter than my other camera and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You really get the most for your money!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So I’ve tried this camera out for a few weeks. At first the quality wasn’t there for me AT ALL. I wanted to give this camera a fair shot and a real review, so I went into the settings and made sure everything was set to the highest quality. The video was definitely 4K as described. I even loved the Timelapse as well as light feature (you can turn flash on for video to use in low lighting).I did NOT however love the sound. After reaching out regarding this issue, I sent a sample video and learned that the mic on my unit was faulty. I was offered a new unit abs in less than a week it arrived.The sand great video quality but now with the sound to match. Please keep in mind that the playback audio from the camera itself isn’t great, but when uploaded to a computer or transferred to a phone, it sounds great.With such great quality AND customer service, not only will I be recommending this camera, I will be giving away a few as gifts.Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Outdoor Pictures
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for my 12 year old outdoorsy granddaughter. The images she is sharing with me are of good quality. She says it’s easy to use and she loves the camera! I think the research I did paid off with fantastic pictures and a very happy granddaughter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ummmm. Thank you?
reviews.reviewText: We gave this camera to our son for Highschool graduation. He took it to wilderness camp for the summer . The pictures were beautiful. (A great value for the money!) But he came back from camp certain that he wants to be a blogger for the rest of his life. He’s moved back into the basement where he says he will never leave. He has 3 monitors and the super extra you tube membership. I guess we are thankful he found his calling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only focus mode is Auto, Fixed & Manual don’t work
reviews.reviewText: Only way it will focus is in Auto mode.So as an artist, I’m filming my canvas, and it will focus on it, but when I remove my hands from the field even briefly, it re-focuses which means it goes blurry for a second about every other second. It’s dizzying to watch.I’ve spent easily 8 hours learning this camera and feel pretty frustrated to have wasted all that time making myself an expert on it. It’s not worth keeping with the failure to focus.Also, the edge of the viewer field is not the edge of what is captured. So I had to put small lines on the viewfinder to keep track of where it actually cut off,I had a lot of hope for this camera. I’d read the sound wasn’t great but was using a Mike so that was fine.I’m pretty disappointed. I’d be mad if I weren’t so out of energy from trying to set this shot up all day and in the end failing not due to me, but due to the CAMERA’s FAILURE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great for the price however, I’m not use to a camera the phone makes things so simple. I do like all the different settings it has

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Camera to use for a new vlogger
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this gift for my nineteen year old daughter who loves making vlogs! It is easy to use and makes wonderful videos for her to share on her blog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a SUPER Camera for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, I'm VERY IMPRESSED by this camera's features for its relatively inexpensive price point.The FEEL of the camera is quality and substance... It's fairly LIGHT, and yet STURDY. Good feel.Those batteries do seem a bit tiny, though. It will be interesting to see over time how well they hold up on the job, to ensure that photo opportunities aren't lost, when the power goes out!(Of course there's that option to carry and external power block and plug in the camera while on the go)The collection of accessories with the camera are good. And that Macro Lens is an attractive add.All in all, we're very excited to have a new tool in the photography tool belt.Promises to be a GREAT one! : )
Bad battery life, focus not working in video mode.
